mapper.update: update cms_user set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, birthday = #{birthday}, gender = #{gender}, locked = #{locked}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, url = #{url}, score = #{score}, role = #{role} where id=#{id}
update cms_user set locked=#{locked},update_time=now() WHERE id=#{userId}
mapper.select: select * from cms_user where username = #{value} limit 1

select id,username,password,nickname,birthday,gender, locked,create_time as createTime,update_time as updateTime,url, score,role from cms_user where username like concat('%',#{name},'%') order by createTime desc
